creator: BLK Dating
descriptionHtml:
BLK is the new app for Black single men and Black single women with a simple mission: To create an exclusive community where Black men and Black women can find meaningful connections with people who share similar likes and interests.

BLK is easy and fun to use:
• Simply scroll through a personalized list of profiles.
• If you're interested, slide the profile to right to give the person a ‘Yeah’, or click the 'Heart' icon.
• If the feeling's mutual, then you're a match and can start chatting in our app right away.
• Not interested? Slide the profile to the left to give the person a ‘Nah’, or click the ‘X’ icon.

Right when you join, all members can:
• Become part of an exclusive community for single black men and black women
• Like other members near you
• Customize who and what they’re looking for
• Receive a personalized group of profiles to look through every day
• Chat with other members if they’ve liked you back

Go Premium and you can also:
• Rewind on people to give them a second chance
• Send over 100 Really Likes per month to stand out from the crowd and let people know that you're really interested
• Boost your profile each month to be one of the top profiles in your area for 30 minutes
• Have an uninterrupted experience with no ads!
descriptionShort: A fun, easy-to use dating app for Black men and Black women.

BLK is the new app for Black single men and Black single women with a simple mission: To create an exclusive community where Black men and Black women can find meaningful connections with people who share similar likes and interests.

BLK is easy and fun to use:
• Simply scroll through a personalized list of profiles.
• If you're interested, slide the profile to right to give the person a ‘Yeah’, or click the 'Heart' icon.
• If the feeling's mutual, then you're a match and can start chatting in our app right away.
• Not interested? Slide the profile to the left to give the person a ‘Nah’, or click the ‘X’ icon.

Right when you join, all members can:
• Become part of an exclusive community for single black men and black women
• Like other members near you
• Customize who and what they’re looking for
• Receive a personalized group of profiles to look through every day
• Chat with other members if they’ve liked you back

Go Premium and you can also:
• Rewind on people to give them a second chance
• Send over 100 Really Likes per month to stand out from the crowd and let people know that you're really interested
• Boost your profile each month to be one of the top profiles in your area for 30 minutes
• Have an uninterrupted experience with no ads!
descriptionShort: A fun, easy-to use dating app for Black men and Black women.

title: BLK Dating: Meet Black Singles

creator: BLK Dating
descriptionHtml:
BLK is a dating and lifestyle app for culture makers in the Black community. Our mission is simple: To create a warm, inviting, supportive, and inclusive space where Black love is celebrated and respected in all its forms. ✅ We want you to feel safe here, like you’re at home. We’re family, and around fam, you are able to express yourself… your full self! 💯

Black is beautiful. BLK is a platform where Blackness is celebrated 🙌🏾, Black people are seen 👀, and Black voices are amplified 📣. Black Excellence is rooted in Black Love. 🫶🏾 Love for self. 🤎 Love for others. 🤎 And love for community.🤎

Rated one of the 15 Best Online Dating Apps to Find Relationships by Oprah Daily. 🏆
Rated one of the 10 Best Black Dating Sites to Meet Black Singles in 2022 by SF Gate 🏆
Rated The Best Dating App for Black Women by 21Ninety 🏆

We are more than just an online dating app. We are an online community. BLK is a lifestyle. 😎 Make meaningful connections on all levels. Find love. Find friends. Find your match. Find your squad.

• “BLK APP is more than just a place to connect with Black singles; it’s creating a community for change” – The Grio
• “The Dating App Prioritizing Black Love Year-Round” - PAPER
• “BLK sets out to reclaim ‘Once You Go BLK’ and celebrates the unlimited potential of Black Love” – Purposely Awakened

🖤 BLK is an easy and fun dating and lifestyle app to find new friends and romance:
• First, set up a free profile and set your connection preferences.
• Next, easily scroll through a personalized list of profiles. 📱
• If you like what you see, slide the profile to the 👉🏾 right to let them know you’re feeling their profile.
• If the feeling's mutual, then you're a match and can start chatting in our app right away.
• Not interested? Slide the profile to the left 👈🏾 and keep scrolling.

Add a self-expression sticker to your profile to give potential matches more insight into who you are. You can search 🧐 and match 😍 with new people based on shared profile stickers.

🖤 After setting up your profile, you can immediately:
• Join a community of millions of others like yourself rooting for everything Black!
• Socially connect with your local Black community📍
• Customize who and what they’re looking for
• Receive a daily personalized group of profiles to look through
• Chat with other members and build relationships
• Have real-time video interaction through live-streaming on BLK Live! 🎬

🖤 Go Premium, and you can also:
• Rewind ⏮on people to give them a second chance, or if you accidentally slid them to the left 😬
• Send over 100 Super Likes 🤩 per month to stand out from the crowd and let people know that you're really interested
• Boost your profile each month to be one of the top profiles in your area for 30 minutes 🥇
• Have an uninterrupted experience with no ads!

🖤 Become Elite, and you can:
• Get all of the Premium benefits PLUS See Who's Liked You for instant matches!

Everyone is welcome regardless of gender identity or sexual preference. The LGBTQ+ community has a home on BLK. 🌈 Queer dating has a home on BLK. Meet new people that proudly represent and support you! ✊🏾

So, what now? Join the community, spread the word, find a match, and have fun!

Privacy Policy: https://www.blk-app.com/en/privacy-policy Terms & Conditions: https://www.blk-app.com/en/terms-of-use

If you choose to purchase a subscription, payment will be charged to your iTunes account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of your subscription. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase. title: BLK Dating: Meet Black Singles

creator: BLK Dating
descriptionHtml:
BLK is the app for Black single men and Black single women with a simple mission: To create an exclusive community where Black men and Black women can find meaningful connections with people who share similar likes and interests.

BLK is easy and fun to use:
• Simply scroll through a personalized list of profiles.
• If you're interested, slide the profile to right to give the person a ‘Yeah’, or click the 'Heart' icon.
• If the feeling's mutual, then you're a match and can start chatting in our app right away.
• Not interested? Slide the profile to the left to give the person a ‘Nah’, or click the ‘X’ icon.

Right when you join, all members can:
• Become part of an exclusive community for single black men and black women
• Like other members near you
• Customize who and what they’re looking for
• Receive a personalized group of profiles to look through every day
• Chat with other members if they’ve liked you back

Go Premium and you can also:
• Send 5 Super Likes per week to stand out from the crowd and let people know that you're really interested
• Rewind on people to give them a second chance
• Boost your profile each month to be one of the top profiles in your area for 30 minutes
• Send unlimited amount of likes to other members
• Have an uninterrupted experience with no ads!

Become Elite and you can:
• Get all of the Premium benefits PLUS
• Remove the mystery and See Who's Liked You for instant matches!
descriptionShort: Chat, match and date Black singles. Meet local people nearby and make friends.

title: BLK Dating: Meet Black Singles

creator: BLK Dating
descriptionHtml:
BLK is a dating and lifestyle app for culture makers in the Black community. Our mission is simple: To create a warm, inviting, supportive, and inclusive space where Black love is celebrated and respected in all its forms. ✅ We want you to feel safe here, like you’re at home. We’re family, and around fam, you are able to express yourself… your full self! 💯

Black is beautiful. BLK is a platform where Blackness is celebrated 🙌🏾, Black people are seen 👀, and Black voices are amplified 📣. Black Excellence is rooted in Black Love. 🫶🏾 Love for self. 🤎 Love for others. 🤎 And love for community.🤎

Rated one of the 15 Best Online Dating Apps to Find Relationships by Oprah Daily. 🏆
Rated one of the 10 Best Black Dating Sites to Meet Black Singles in 2022 by SF Gate 🏆
Rated The Best Dating App for Black Women by 21Ninety 🏆

We are more than just an online dating app. We are an online community. BLK is a lifestyle. 😎 Make meaningful connections on all levels. Find love. Find friends. Find your match. Find your squad.

• “BLK APP is more than just a place to connect with Black singles; it’s creating a community for change” – The Grio
• “The Dating App Prioritizing Black Love Year-Round” - PAPER
• “BLK sets out to reclaim ‘Once You Go BLK’ and celebrates the unlimited potential of Black Love” – Purposely Awakened

🖤 BLK is an easy and fun dating and lifestyle app to find new friends and romance:
• First, set up a free profile and set your connection preferences.
• Next, easily scroll through a personalized list of profiles. 📱
• If you like what you see, slide the profile to the 👉🏾 right to let them know you’re feeling their profile.
• If the feeling's mutual, then you're a match and can start chatting in our app right away.
• Not interested? Slide the profile to the left 👈🏾 and keep scrolling.

Add a self-expression sticker to your profile to give potential matches more insight into who you are. You can search 🧐 and match 😍 with new people based on shared profile stickers.

🖤 After setting up your profile, you can immediately:
• Join a community of millions of others like yourself rooting for everything Black!
• Socially connect with your local Black community📍
• Customize who and what they’re looking for
• Receive a daily personalized group of profiles to look through
• Chat with other members and build relationships
• Have real-time video interaction through live-streaming on BLK Live! 🎬

🖤 Go Premium, and you can also:
• Rewind ⏮on people to give them a second chance, or if you accidentally slid them to the left 😬
• Send over 100 Super Likes 🤩 per month to stand out from the crowd and let people know that you're really interested
• Boost your profile each month to be one of the top profiles in your area for 30 minutes 🥇
• Have an uninterrupted experience with no ads!

🖤 Become Elite, and you can:
• Get all of the Premium benefits PLUS See Who's Liked You for instant matches!

Everyone is welcome regardless of gender identity or sexual preference. The LGBTQ+ community has a home on BLK. 🌈 Queer dating has a home on BLK. Meet new people that proudly represent and support you! ✊🏾

So, what now? Join the community, spread the word, find a match, and have fun!

Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase. Current subscription starts at 9.99, and one-month, 3-month, and 6-month packages are available. Prices are in U.S. dollars, may vary in countries other than the U.S. and are subject to change without notice. If you don’t choose to purchase a subscription, you can simply continue to use BLK.

• Elite Subscription: Includes all Premium features, plus the ability to see who's liked you for an instant match!

creator: BLK Dating
descriptionHtml:
BLK is a dating and lifestyle app for culture makers in the Black community. Our mission is simple: To create a warm, inviting, supportive, and inclusive space where Black love is celebrated and respected in all its forms. ✅ We want you to feel safe here, like you’re at home. We’re family, and around fam, you are able to express yourself… your full self! 💯

Black is beautiful. BLK is a platform where Blackness is celebrated 🙌🏾, Black people are seen 👀, and Black voices are amplified 📣. Black Excellence is rooted in Black Love. 🫶🏾 Love for self. 🤎 Love for others. 🤎 And love for community.🤎

Rated one of the 15 Best Online Dating Apps to Find Relationships by Oprah Daily. 🏆
Rated one of the 10 Best Black Dating Sites to Meet Black Singles in 2022 by SF Gate 🏆
Rated The Best Dating App for Black Women by 21Ninety 🏆

We are more than just an online dating app. We are an online community. BLK is a lifestyle. 😎 Make meaningful connections on all levels. Find love. Find friends. Find your match. Find your squad.

• “BLK APP is more than just a place to connect with Black singles; it’s creating a community for change” – The Grio
• “The Dating App Prioritizing Black Love Year-Round” - PAPER
• “BLK sets out to reclaim ‘Once You Go BLK’ and celebrates the unlimited potential of Black Love” – Purposely Awakened

🖤 BLK is an easy and fun dating and lifestyle app to find new friends and romance:
• First, set up a free profile and set your connection preferences.
• Next, easily scroll through a personalized list of profiles. 📱
• If you like what you see, slide the profile to the 👉🏾 right to let them know you’re feeling their profile.
• If the feeling's mutual, then you're a match and can start chatting in our app right away.
• Not interested? Slide the profile to the left 👈🏾 and keep scrolling.

Add a self-expression sticker to your profile to give potential matches more insight into who you are. You can search 🧐 and match 😍 with new people based on shared profile stickers.

🖤 After setting up your profile, you can immediately:
• Join a community of millions of others like yourself rooting for everything Black!
• Socially connect with your local Black community📍
• Customize who and what they’re looking for
• Receive a daily personalized group of profiles to look through
• Chat with other members and build relationships
• Have real-time video interaction through live-streaming on BLK Live! 🎬

🖤 Go Premium, and you can also:
• Rewind ⏮on people to give them a second chance, or if you accidentally slid them to the left 😬
• Send over 100 Super Likes 🤩 per month to stand out from the crowd and let people know that you're really interested
• Boost your profile each month to be one of the top profiles in your area for 30 minutes 🥇
• Have an uninterrupted experience with no ads!

🖤 Become Elite, and you can:
• Get all of the Premium benefits PLUS See Who's Liked You for instant matches!

Everyone is welcome regardless of gender identity or sexual preference. The LGBTQ+ community has a home on BLK. 🌈 Queer dating has a home on BLK. Meet new people that proudly represent and support you! ✊🏾

So, what now? Join the community, spread the word, find a match, and have fun!

Privacy Policy: https://www.blk-app.com/en/privacy-policy Terms & Conditions: https://www.blk-app.com/en/terms-of-use

If you choose to purchase a subscription, payment will be charged to your iTunes account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of your subscription. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase. Current subscription starts at 9.99, and one-month, 3-month, and 6-month packages are available. Prices are in U.S. dollars, may vary in countries other than the U.S. and are subject to change without notice. If you don’t choose to purchase a subscription, you can simply continue to use BLK.
descriptionShort: Chat, match and date Black singles. Meet local people nearby and make friends.

title: BLK Dating: Meet Black Singles

creator: BLK Dating
descriptionHtml:
BLK is a dating and lifestyle app for culture makers in the Black community. Our mission is simple: To create a warm, inviting, supportive, and inclusive space where Black love is celebrated and respected in all its forms. ✅ We want you to feel safe here, like you’re at home. We’re family, and around fam, you are able to express yourself… your full self! 💯

Black is beautiful. BLK is a platform where Blackness is celebrated 🙌🏾, Black people are seen 👀, and Black voices are amplified 📣. Black Excellence is rooted in Black Love. 🫶🏾 Love for self. 🤎 Love for others. 🤎 And love for community.🤎

Rated one of the 15 Best Online Dating Apps to Find Relationships by Oprah Daily. 🏆
Rated one of the 10 Best Black Dating Sites to Meet Black Singles in 2022 by SF Gate 🏆
Rated The Best Dating App for Black Women by 21Ninety 🏆

We are more than just an online dating app. We are an online community. BLK is a lifestyle. 😎 Make meaningful connections on all levels. Find love. Find friends. Find your match. Find your squad.

• “BLK APP is more than just a place to connect with Black singles; it’s creating a community for change” – The Grio
• “The Dating App Prioritizing Black Love Year-Round” - PAPER
• “BLK sets out to reclaim ‘Once You Go BLK’ and celebrates the unlimited potential of Black Love” – Purposely Awakened

🖤 BLK is an easy and fun dating and lifestyle app to find new friends and romance:
• First, set up a free profile and set your connection preferences.
• Next, easily scroll through a personalized list of profiles. 📱
• If you like what you see, slide the profile to the 👉🏾 right to let them know you’re feeling their profile.
• If the feeling's mutual, then you're a match and can start chatting in our app right away.
• Not interested? Slide the profile to the left 👈🏾 and keep scrolling.

Add a self-expression sticker to your profile to give potential matches more insight into who you are. You can search 🧐 and match 😍 with new people based on shared profile stickers.

🖤 After setting up your profile, you can immediately:
• Join a community of millions of others like yourself rooting for everything Black!
• Socially connect with your local Black community📍
• Customize who and what they’re looking for
• Receive a daily personalized group of profiles to look through
• Chat with other members and build relationships
• Have real-time video interaction through live-streaming on BLK Live! 🎬

🖤 Go Premium, and you can also:
• Rewind ⏮on people to give them a second chance, or if you accidentally slid them to the left 😬
• Send over 100 Super Likes 🤩 per month to stand out from the crowd and let people know that you're really interested
• Boost your profile each month to be one of the top profiles in your area for 30 minutes 🥇
• Have an uninterrupted experience with no ads!

🖤 Become Elite, and you can:
• Get all of the Premium benefits PLUS See Who's Liked You for instant matches!

Everyone is welcome regardless of gender identity or sexual preference. The LGBTQ+ community has a home on BLK. 🌈 Queer dating has a home on BLK. Meet new people that proudly represent and support you! ✊🏾

So, what now? Join the community, spread the word, find a match, and have fun!

Privacy Policy: https://www.blk-app.com/en/privacy-policy Terms & Conditions: https://www.blk-app.com/en/terms-of-use

If you choose to purchase a subscription, payment will be charged to your iTunes account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of your subscription. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase. Current subscription starts at 9.99, and one-month, 3-month, and 6-month packages are available. Prices are in U.S. dollars, may vary in countries other than the U.S. and are subject to change without notice. If you don’t choose to purchase a subscription, you can simply continue to use BLK.
descriptionShort: Chat, match and date Black singles. Meet local people nearby and make friends.

descriptionHtml:
BLK is a dating and lifestyle app for culture makers in the Black community. Black is beautiful. BLK is a platform where Blackness is celebrated 🙌🏾, Black people are seen 👀, and Black voices are amplified 📣. Black Excellence is rooted in Black Love. 🫶🏾 Love for self. 🤎 Love for others. 🤎 And love for community.🤎

Rated one of the 10 Best Black Dating Sites to Meet Black Singles in 2022 by SF Gate 🏆

We are more than just an online dating app. We are an online community. BLK is a lifestyle. 😎 Make meaningful connections on all levels. Find love. Find friends. Find your match. Find your squad.

• “BLK APP is more than just a place to connect with Black singles; it’s creating a community for change” – The Grio
• “The Dating App Prioritizing Black Love Year-Round” - PAPER
• “BLK sets out to reclaim ‘Once You Go BLK’ and celebrates the unlimited potential of Black Love” – Purposely Awakened

🖤 BLK is an easy and fun dating and lifestyle app to find new friends and romance:
• First, set up a free profile and set your connection preferences.
• Next, easily scroll through a personalized list of profiles. 📱
• If you like what you see, slide the profile to the 👉🏾 right to let them know you’re feeling their profile.
• If the feeling's mutual, then you're a match and can start chatting in our app right away.
• Not interested? Slide the profile to the left 👈🏾 and keep scrolling.

Add a self-expression sticker to your profile to give potential matches more insight into who you are. You can search 🧐 and match 😍 with new people based on shared profile stickers.

🖤 After setting up your profile, you can immediately:
• Join a community of millions of others like yourself rooting for everything Black!
• Socially connect with your local Black community📍
• Customize who and what they’re looking for
• Receive a daily personalized group of profiles to look through
• Chat with other members and build relationships
• Have real-time video interaction through live-streaming on BLK Live! 🎬

🖤 Go Premium, and you can also:
• Rewind ⏮on people to give them a second chance, or if you accidentally slid them to the left 😬
• Send over 100 Super Likes 🤩 per month to stand out from the crowd and let people know that you're really interested
• Boost your profile each month to be one of the top profiles in your area for 30 minutes 🥇
• Have an uninterrupted experience with no ads!

🖤 Become Elite, and you can:
• Get all of the Premium benefits PLUS See Who's Liked You for instant matches!

Everyone is welcome regardless of gender identity or sexual preference. The LGBTQ+ community has a home on BLK. 🌈 Queer dating has a home on BLK. Meet new people that proudly represent and support you! ✊🏾

title: BLK Dating: Meet Black Singles

creator: BLK Dating
descriptionHtml:
BLK is a dating and lifestyle app for culture makers in the Black community. Our mission is simple: To create a warm, inviting, supportive, and inclusive space where Black love is celebrated and respected in all its forms. ✅ We want you to feel safe here, like you’re at home. We’re family, and around fam, you are able to express yourself… your full self! 💯

Black is beautiful. BLK is a platform where Blackness is celebrated 🙌🏾, Black people are seen 👀, and Black voices are amplified 📣. Black Excellence is rooted in Black Love. 🫶🏾 Love for self. 🤎 Love for others. 🤎 And love for community.🤎

Rated one of the 15 Best Online Dating Apps to Find Relationships by Oprah Daily. 🏆
Rated one of the 10 Best Black Dating Sites to Meet Black Singles in 2022 by SF Gate 🏆
Rated The Best Dating App for Black Women by 21Ninety 🏆

We are more than just an online dating app. We are an online community. BLK is a lifestyle. 😎 Make meaningful connections on all levels. Find love. Find friends. Find your match. Find your squad.

• “BLK APP is more than just a place to connect with Black singles; it’s creating a community for change” – The Grio
• “The Dating App Prioritizing Black Love Year-Round” - PAPER
• “BLK sets out to reclaim ‘Once You Go BLK’ and celebrates the unlimited potential of Black Love” – Purposely Awakened

🖤 BLK is an easy and fun dating and lifestyle app to find new friends and romance:
• First, set up a free profile and set your connection preferences.
• Next, easily scroll through a personalized list of profiles. 📱
• If you like what you see, slide the profile to the 👉🏾 right to let them know you’re feeling their profile.
• If the feeling's mutual, then you're a match and can start chatting in our app right away.
• Not interested? Slide the profile to the left 👈🏾 and keep scrolling.

Add a self-expression sticker to your profile to give potential matches more insight into who you are. You can search 🧐 and match 😍 with new people based on shared profile stickers.

🖤 After setting up your profile, you can immediately:
• Join a community of millions of others like yourself rooting for everything Black!
• Socially connect with your local Black community📍
• Customize who and what they’re looking for
• Receive a daily personalized group of profiles to look through
• Chat with other members and build relationships
• Have real-time video interaction through live-streaming on BLK Live! 🎬

🖤 Go Premium, and you can also:
• Rewind ⏮on people to give them a second chance, or if you accidentally slid them to the left 😬
• Send over 100 Super Likes 🤩 per month to stand out from the crowd and let people know that you're really interested
• Boost your profile each month to be one of the top profiles in your area for 30 minutes 🥇
• Have an uninterrupted experience with no ads!

🖤 Become Elite, and you can:
• Get all of the Premium benefits PLUS See Who's Liked You for instant matches!

Everyone is welcome regardless of gender identity or sexual preference. The LGBTQ+ community has a home on BLK. 🌈 Queer dating has a home on BLK. Meet new people that proudly represent and support you! ✊🏾

So, what now? Join the community, spread the word, find a match, and have fun!

Current subscription starts at 9.99, and one-month, 3-month, and 6-month packages are available. Prices are in U.S. dollars, may vary in countries other than the U.S. and are subject to change without notice. If you don’t choose to purchase a subscription, you can simply continue to use BLK.

title: BLK Dating: Meet Black Singles

creator: BLK Dating
descriptionHtml:
BLK is a dating and lifestyle app for culture makers in the Black community. Our mission is simple: To create a warm, inviting, supportive, and inclusive space where Black love is celebrated and respected in all its forms. ✅ We want you to feel safe here, like you’re at home. We’re family, and around fam, you are able to express yourself… your full self! 💯

Black is beautiful. BLK is a platform where Blackness is celebrated 🙌🏾, Black people are seen 👀, and Black voices are amplified 📣. Black Excellence is rooted in Black Love. 🫶🏾 Love for self. 🤎 Love for others. 🤎 And love for community.🤎

Rated one of the 15 Best Online Dating Apps to Find Relationships by Oprah Daily. 🏆
Rated one of the 10 Best Black Dating Sites to Meet Black Singles in 2022 by SF Gate 🏆
Rated The Best Dating App for Black Women by 21Ninety 🏆

We are more than just an online dating app. We are an online community. BLK is a lifestyle. 😎 Make meaningful connections on all levels. Find love. Find friends. Find your match. Find your squad.

• “BLK APP is more than just a place to connect with Black singles; it’s creating a community for change” – The Grio
• “The Dating App Prioritizing Black Love Year-Round” - PAPER
• “BLK sets out to reclaim ‘Once You Go BLK’ and celebrates the unlimited potential of Black Love” – Purposely Awakened

🖤 BLK is an easy and fun dating and lifestyle app to find new friends and romance:
• First, set up a free profile and set your connection preferences.
• Next, easily scroll through a personalized list of profiles. 📱
• If you like what you see, slide the profile to the 👉🏾 right to let them know you’re feeling their profile.
• If the feeling's mutual, then you're a match and can start chatting in our app right away.
• Not interested? Slide the profile to the left 👈🏾 and keep scrolling.

Add a self-expression sticker to your profile to give potential matches more insight into who you are. You can search 🧐 and match 😍 with new people based on shared profile stickers.

🖤 After setting up your profile, you can immediately:
• Join a community of millions of others like yourself rooting for everything Black!
• Socially connect with your local Black community📍
• Customize who and what they’re looking for
• Receive a daily personalized group of profiles to look through
• Chat with other members and build relationships
• Have real-time video interaction through live-streaming on BLK Live! 🎬

🖤 Go Premium, and you can also:
• Rewind ⏮on people to give them a second chance, or if you accidentally slid them to the left 😬
• Send over 100 Super Likes 🤩 per month to stand out from the crowd and let people know that you're really interested
• Boost your profile each month to be one of the top profiles in your area for 30 minutes 🥇
• Have an uninterrupted experience with no ads!

🖤 Become Elite, and you can:
• Get all of the Premium benefits PLUS See Who's Liked You for instant matches!

Everyone is welcome regardless of gender identity or sexual preference. The LGBTQ+ community has a home on BLK. 🌈 Queer dating has a home on BLK. Meet new people that proudly represent and support you! ✊🏾

So, what now? Join the community, spread the word, find a match, and have fun!

creator: BLK Dating
descriptionHtml:
BLK is a dating and lifestyle app for culture makers in the Black community. Our mission is simple: To create a warm, inviting, supportive, and inclusive space where Black love is celebrated and respected in all its forms. ✅ We want you to feel safe here, like you’re at home. We’re family, and around fam, you are able to express yourself… your full self! 💯

Black is beautiful. BLK is a platform where Blackness is celebrated 🙌🏾, Black people are seen 👀, and Black voices are amplified 📣. Black Excellence is rooted in Black Love. 🫶🏾 Love for self. 🤎 Love for others. 🤎 And love for community.🤎

Rated one of the 15 Best Online Dating Apps to Find Relationships by Oprah Daily. 🏆
Rated one of the 10 Best Black Dating Sites to Meet Black Singles in 2022 by SF Gate 🏆
Rated The Best Dating App for Black Women by 21Ninety 🏆

We are more than just an online dating app. We are an online community. BLK is a lifestyle. 😎 Make meaningful connections on all levels. Find love. Find friends. Find your match. Find your squad.

• “BLK APP is more than just a place to connect with Black singles; it’s creating a community for change” – The Grio
• “The Dating App Prioritizing Black Love Year-Round” - PAPER
• “BLK sets out to reclaim ‘Once You Go BLK’ and celebrates the unlimited potential of Black Love” – Purposely Awakened

🖤 BLK is an easy and fun dating and lifestyle app to find new friends and romance:
• First, set up a free profile and set your connection preferences.
• Next, easily scroll through a personalized list of profiles. 📱
• If you like what you see, slide the profile to the 👉🏾 right to let them know you’re feeling their profile.
• If the feeling's mutual, then you're a match and can start chatting in our app right away.
• Not interested? Slide the profile to the left 👈🏾 and keep scrolling.

Add a self-expression sticker to your profile to give potential matches more insight into who you are. You can search 🧐 and match 😍 with new people based on shared profile stickers.

🖤 After setting up your profile, you can immediately:
• Join a community of millions of others like yourself rooting for everything Black!
• Socially connect with your local Black community📍
• Customize who and what they’re looking for
• Receive a daily personalized group of profiles to look through
• Chat with other members and build relationships
• Have real-time video interaction through live-streaming on BLK Live! 🎬

🖤 Go Premium, and you can also:
• Rewind ⏮on people to give them a second chance, or if you accidentally slid them to the left 😬
• Send over 100 Super Likes 🤩 per month to stand out from the crowd and let people know that you're really interested
• Boost your profile each month to be one of the top profiles in your area for 30 minutes 🥇
• Have an uninterrupted experience with no ads!

🖤 Become Elite, and you can:
• Get all of the Premium benefits PLUS See Who's Liked You for instant matches!

Everyone is welcome regardless of gender identity or sexual preference. The LGBTQ+ community has a home on BLK. 🌈 Queer dating has a home on BLK. Meet new people that proudly represent and support you! ✊🏾

So, what now? Join the community, spread the word, find a match, and have fun!

title: BLK Dating: Meet Black Singles

creator: BLK Dating
descriptionHtml:
BLK is a dating and lifestyle app for culture makers in the Black community. Our mission is simple: To create a warm, inviting, supportive, and inclusive space where Black love is celebrated and respected in all its forms. ✅ We want you to feel safe here, like you’re at home. We’re family, and around fam, you are able to express yourself… your full self! 💯

Black is beautiful. BLK is a platform where Blackness is celebrated 🙌🏾, Black people are seen 👀, and Black voices are amplified 📣. Black Excellence is rooted in Black Love. 🫶🏾 Love for self. 🤎 Love for others. 🤎 And love for community.🤎

Rated one of the 15 Best Online Dating Apps to Find Relationships by Oprah Daily. 🏆
Rated one of the 10 Best Black Dating Sites to Meet Black Singles in 2022 by SF Gate 🏆
Rated The Best Dating App for Black Women by 21Ninety 🏆

We are more than just an online dating app. We are an online community. BLK is a lifestyle. 😎 Make meaningful connections on all levels. Find love. Find friends. Find your match. Find your squad.

• “BLK APP is more than just a place to connect with Black singles; it’s creating a community for change” – The Grio
• “The Dating App Prioritizing Black Love Year-Round” - PAPER
• “BLK sets out to reclaim ‘Once You Go BLK’ and celebrates the unlimited potential of Black Love” – Purposely Awakened

🖤 BLK is an easy and fun dating and lifestyle app to find new friends and romance:
• First, set up a free profile and set your connection preferences.
• Next, easily scroll through a personalized list of profiles. 📱
• If you like what you see, slide the profile to the 👉🏾 right to let them know you’re feeling their profile.
• If the feeling's mutual, then you're a match and can start chatting in our app right away.
• Not interested? Slide the profile to the left 👈🏾 and keep scrolling.

Add a self-expression sticker to your profile to give potential matches more insight into who you are. You can search 🧐 and match 😍 with new people based on shared profile stickers.

🖤 After setting up your profile, you can immediately:
• Join a community of millions of others like yourself rooting for everything Black!
• Socially connect with your local Black community📍
• Customize who and what they’re looking for
• Receive a daily personalized group of profiles to look through
• Chat with other members and build relationships
• Have real-time video interaction through live-streaming on BLK Live! 🎬

🖤 Go Premium, and you can also:
• Rewind ⏮on people to give them a second chance, or if you accidentally slid them to the left 😬
• Send over 100 Super Likes 🤩 per month to stand out from the crowd and let people know that you're really interested
• Boost your profile each month to be one of the top profiles in your area for 30 minutes 🥇
• Have an uninterrupted experience with no ads!

🖤 Become Elite, and you can:
• Get all of the Premium benefits PLUS See Who's Liked You for instant matches!

Everyone is welcome regardless of gender identity or sexual preference. The LGBTQ+ community has a home on BLK. 🌈 Queer dating has a home on BLK. Meet new people that proudly represent and support you! ✊🏾

So, what now? Join the community, spread the word, find a match, and have fun!

🖤 BLK is an easy and fun dating and lifestyle app to find new friends and romance:
• First, set up a free profile and set your connection preferences.
• Next, easily scroll through a personalized list of profiles. 📱
• If you like what you see, slide the profile to the 👉🏾 right to let them know you’re feeling their profile.
• If the feeling's mutual, then you're a match and can start chatting in our app right away.
• Not interested? Slide the profile to the left 👈🏾 and keep scrolling.

Add a self-expression sticker to your profile to give potential matches more insight into who you are. You can search 🧐 and match 😍 with new people based on shared profile stickers.

🖤 After setting up your profile, you can immediately:
• Join a community of millions of others like yourself rooting for everything Black!
• Socially connect with your local Black community📍
• Customize who and what they’re looking for
• Receive a daily personalized group of profiles to look through
• Chat with other members and build relationships
• Have real-time video interaction through live-streaming on BLK Live! 🎬

🖤 Go Premium, and you can also:
• Rewind ⏮on people to give them a second chance, or if you accidentally slid them to the left 😬
• Send over 100 Super Likes 🤩 per month to stand out from the crowd and let people know that you're really interested
• Boost your profile each month to be one of the top profiles in your area for 30 minutes 🥇
• Have an uninterrupted experience with no ads!

🖤 Become Elite, and you can:
• Get all of the Premium benefits PLUS See Who's Liked You for instant matches!

Everyone is welcome regardless of gender identity or sexual preference. The LGBTQ+ community has a home on BLK. 🌈 Queer dating has a home on BLK. Meet new people that proudly represent and support you! ✊🏾

So, what now? Join the community, spread the word, find a match, and have fun!

title:
BLK Dating: Meet Black Singles
3.8.0

creator: BLK Dating
descriptionHtml:
BLK is a dating and lifestyle app for culture makers in the Black community. Our mission is simple: To create a warm, inviting, supportive, and inclusive space where Black love is celebrated and respected in all its forms. ✅ We want you to feel safe here, like you’re at home. We’re family, and around fam, you are able to express yourself… your full self! 💯

Black is beautiful. BLK is a platform where Blackness is celebrated 🙌🏾, Black people are seen 👀, and Black voices are amplified 📣. Black Excellence is rooted in Black Love. 🫶🏾 Love for self. 🤎 Love for others. 🤎 And love for community.🤎

Rated one of the 15 Best Online Dating Apps to Find Relationships by Oprah Daily. 🏆
Rated one of the 10 Best Black Dating Sites to Meet Black Singles in 2022 by SF Gate 🏆
Rated The Best Dating App for Black Women by 21Ninety 🏆

We are more than just an online dating app. We are an online community. BLK is a lifestyle. 😎 Make meaningful connections on all levels. Find love. Find friends. Find your match. Find your squad.

• “BLK APP is more than just a place to connect with Black singles; it’s creating a community for change” – The Grio
• “The Dating App Prioritizing Black Love Year-Round” - PAPER
• “BLK sets out to reclaim ‘Once You Go BLK’ and celebrates the unlimited potential of Black Love” – Purposely Awakened

🖤 BLK is an easy and fun dating and lifestyle app to find new friends and romance:
• First, set up a free profile and set your connection preferences.
• Next, easily scroll through a personalized list of profiles. 📱
• If you like what you see, slide the profile to the 👉🏾 right to let them know you’re feeling their profile.
• If the feeling's mutual, then you're a match and can start chatting in our app right away.
• Not interested? Slide the profile to the left 👈🏾 and keep scrolling.

Add a self-expression sticker to your profile to give potential matches more insight into who you are. You can search 🧐 and match 😍 with new people based on shared profile stickers.

🖤 After setting up your profile, you can immediately:
• Join a community of millions of others like yourself rooting for everything Black!
• Socially connect with your local Black community📍
• Customize who and what they’re looking for
• Receive a daily personalized group of profiles to look through
• Chat with other members and build relationships
• Have real-time video interaction through live-streaming on BLK Live! 🎬

🖤 Go Premium, and you can also:
• Rewind ⏮on people to give them a second chance, or if you accidentally slid them to the left 😬
• Send over 100 Super Likes 🤩 per month to stand out from the crowd and let people know that you're really interested
• Boost your profile each month to be one of the top profiles in your area for 30 minutes 🥇
• Have an uninterrupted experience with no ads!

🖤 Become Elite, and you can:
• Get all of the Premium benefits PLUS See Who's Liked You for instant matches!

Everyone is welcome regardless of gender identity or sexual preference. The LGBTQ+ community has a home on BLK. 🌈 Queer dating has a home on BLK. Meet new people that proudly represent and support you! ✊🏾

So, what now? Join the community, spread the word, find a match, and have fun!

• “The Dating App Prioritizing Black Love Year-Round” - PAPER
• “BLK sets out to reclaim ‘Once You Go BLK’ and celebrates the unlimited potential of Black Love” – Purposely Awakened

🖤 BLK is an easy and fun dating and lifestyle app to find new friends and romance:
• First, set up a free profile and set your connection preferences.
• Next, easily scroll through a personalized list of profiles. 📱
• If you like what you see, slide the profile to the 👉🏾 right to let them know you’re feeling their profile.
• If the feeling's mutual, then you're a match and can start chatting in our app right away.
• Not interested? Slide the profile to the left 👈🏾 and keep scrolling.

Add a self-expression sticker to your profile to give potential matches more insight into who you are. You can search 🧐 and match 😍 with new people based on shared profile stickers.

🖤 After setting up your profile, you can immediately:
• Join a community of millions of others like yourself rooting for everything Black!
• Socially connect with your local Black community📍
• Customize who and what they’re looking for
• Receive a daily personalized group of profiles to look through
• Chat with other members and build relationships
• Have real-time video interaction through live-streaming on BLK Live! 🎬

🖤 Go Premium, and you can also:
• Rewind ⏮on people to give them a second chance, or if you accidentally slid them to the left 😬
• Send over 100 Super Likes 🤩 per month to stand out from the crowd and let people know that you're really interested
• Boost your profile each month to be one of the top profiles in your area for 30 minutes 🥇
• Have an uninterrupted experience with no ads!

🖤 Become Elite, and you can:
• Get all of the Premium benefits PLUS See Who's Liked You for instant matches!

Everyone is welcome regardless of gender identity or sexual preference. The LGBTQ+ community has a home on BLK. 🌈 Queer dating has a home on BLK. Meet new people that proudly represent and support you! ✊🏾

So, what now? Join the community, spread the word, find a match, and have fun!

Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase. Current subscription starts at 9.99, and one-month, 3-month, and 6-month packages are available. Prices are in U.S. dollars, may vary in countries other than the U.S. and are subject to change without notice. If you don’t choose to purchase a subscription, you can simply continue to use BLK.

Rated one of the 10 Best Black Dating Sites to Meet Black Singles in 2022 by SF Gate 🏆
Rated The Best Dating App for Black Women by 21Ninety 🏆

We are more than just an online dating app. We are an online community. BLK is a lifestyle. 😎 Make meaningful connections on all levels. Find love. Find friends. Find your match. Find your squad.

• “BLK APP is more than just a place to connect with Black singles; it’s creating a community for change” – The Grio
• “The Dating App Prioritizing Black Love Year-Round” - PAPER
• “BLK sets out to reclaim ‘Once You Go BLK’ and celebrates the unlimited potential of Black Love” – Purposely Awakened

🖤 BLK is an easy and fun dating and lifestyle app to find new friends and romance:
• First, set up a free profile and set your connection preferences.
• Next, easily scroll through a personalized list of profiles. 📱
• If you like what you see, slide the profile to the 👉🏾 right to let them know you’re feeling their profile.
• If the feeling's mutual, then you're a match and can start chatting in our app right away.
• Not interested? Slide the profile to the left 👈🏾 and keep scrolling.

Add a self-expression sticker to your profile to give potential matches more insight into who you are. You can search 🧐 and match 😍 with new people based on shared profile stickers.

🖤 After setting up your profile, you can immediately:
• Join a community of millions of others like yourself rooting for everything Black!
• Socially connect with your local Black community📍
• Customize who and what they’re looking for
• Receive a daily personalized group of profiles to look through
• Chat with other members and build relationships
• Have real-time video interaction through live-streaming on BLK Live! 🎬

🖤 Go Premium, and you can also:
• Rewind ⏮on people to give them a second chance, or if you accidentally slid them to the left 😬
• Send over 100 Super Likes 🤩 per month to stand out from the crowd and let people know that you're really interested
• Boost your profile each month to be one of the top profiles in your area for 30 minutes 🥇
• Have an uninterrupted experience with no ads!

🖤 Become Elite, and you can:
• Get all of the Premium benefits PLUS See Who's Liked You for instant matches!

Rated one of the 15 Best Online Dating Apps to Find Relationships by Oprah Daily. 🏆
Rated one of the 10 Best Black Dating Sites to Meet Black Singles in 2022 by SF Gate 🏆
Rated The Best Dating App for Black Women by 21Ninety 🏆

We are more than just an online dating app. We are an online community. BLK is a lifestyle. 😎 Make meaningful connections on all levels. Find love. Find friends. Find your match. Find your squad.

• “BLK APP is more than just a place to connect with Black singles; it’s creating a community for change” – The Grio
• “The Dating App Prioritizing Black Love Year-Round” - PAPER
• “BLK sets out to reclaim ‘Once You Go BLK’ and celebrates the unlimited potential of Black Love” – Purposely Awakened

🖤 BLK is an easy and fun dating and lifestyle app to find new friends and romance:
• First, set up a free profile and set your connection preferences.
• Next, easily scroll through a personalized list of profiles. 📱
• If you like what you see, slide the profile to the 👉🏾 right to let them know you’re feeling their profile.
• If the feeling's mutual, then you're a match and can start chatting in our app right away.
• Not interested? Slide the profile to the left 👈🏾 and keep scrolling.

Add a self-expression sticker to your profile to give potential matches more insight into who you are. You can search 🧐 and match 😍 with new people based on shared profile stickers.

🖤 After setting up your profile, you can immediately:
• Join a community of millions of others like yourself rooting for everything Black!
• Socially connect with your local Black community📍
• Customize who and what they’re looking for
• Receive a daily personalized group of profiles to look through
• Chat with other members and build relationships
• Have real-time video interaction through live-streaming on BLK Live! 🎬

🖤 Go Premium, and you can also:
• Rewind ⏮on people to give them a second chance, or if you accidentally slid them to the left 😬
• Send over 100 Super Likes 🤩 per month to stand out from the crowd and let people know that you're really interested
• Boost your profile each month to be one of the top profiles in your area for 30 minutes 🥇
• Have an uninterrupted experience with no ads!

🖤 Become Elite, and you can:
• Get all of the Premium benefits PLUS See Who's Liked You for instant matches!

Everyone is welcome regardless of gender identity or sexual preference. The LGBTQ+ community has a home on BLK. 🌈 Queer dating has a home on BLK. Meet new people that proudly represent and support you! ✊🏾

So, what now? Join the community, spread the word, find a match, and have fun!
